name: digital-receipts
description: A monorepo for everything concerning digital receipts

scripts.start: npm start --prefix shop & npm start --prefix user-email & npm start --prefix user-accounting & npm start --prefix hash-registry & npm start --prefix ca
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate --prefix hash-registry & npm run migrate --prefix ca
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix ca & npm install --prefix hash-registry & npm install --prefix shop & npm install --prefix user-accounting & npm install --prefix user-email && npm i
